name: Ancient Golf (itch)
description:
Hello everybody I hope you're doing great!

So this is the game that I made from this artpack:

  •  https://opengameart.org/content/two-dungeon-wall-tilesets

for the Jams Every Now and Then - 2, a little weekly competition with some friends to expand our portofolio.

Controls: Drag the mouse across the screen to launch de ball.

You can restart pressing R and skipt the level pressing space.

I hope you have a great time playing it!
